content: I've seen "The Wicker Man" before, but I'll definitely check out the other recommendations. I've been on a roll with horror films lately, and attending film festivals has been a great way to discover new titles and meet fellow horror fans. Speaking of which, I was just talking to my cousin about "The Cabin in the Woods" and how much we both loved it. We actually met up at FrightFest in London, where I attended the sneak peek screening on August 12th. Do you have any recommendations for horror movies that feature a similar blend of humor and horror, like "Cabin in the Woods"?
